content.body: Specifically, http://wpt.live/mimesniff/mime-types/charset-parameter.window.html seems to expect the charset from `text/html;test=ÿ;charset=gbk` to be successfully parsed. Should the test field be ignored, re-encoded or set to the replacement character?
content.formatted_body: Specifically, http://wpt.live/mimesniff/mime-types/charset-parameter.window.html seems to expect the charset from text/html;test=ÿ;charset=gbk to be successfully parsed. Should the test field be ignored, re-encoded or set to the replacement character?
